name: LEGO Batman
overview: Lego Batman is an unlicensed platformer based on the 2008 J2ME version of Lego Batman: The Mobile Game, released in Russia for the Sega Mega Drive in 2014 by BMB. The game plays much similar to Lego Batman: The Mobile Game. The player plays as Batman and the objective is to collect gears. The enemies are Riddler Goons, Criminals, and Santa Goons. Studs (which were most likely drawn from scratch) are in the game too. If 200 are collected an extra life is earned. They can also earn extra lives which are batman symbols. Oddly, the ending of the game has the player save Santa Claus. There are no continues.
